original_text: ‘Someone had lent two men some money. He had lent one of them 500 silver coins. He had lent the other one 50 coins.
korean_text: 이르시되 빚 주는 사람에게 빚진 자가 둘이 있어 하나는 오백 데나리온을 졌고 하나는 오십 데나리온을 졌는데

sentences.original_text: Someone had lent two men some money.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람이 두 사람에게 돈을 빌려주었어요.

sentences.original_text: He had lent one of them 500 silver coins.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들 중 한 사람에게 은화 500닢을 빌려주었어요.

sentences.original_text: He had lent the other one 50 coins.
